channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree growing over the cycle and pedestrian path, 30th July
item.description:
There is a large tree growing over the pedestrian and cycle path next to the college.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Princess Elizabeth Way, Benhall, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Depression in A40 (Suffolk Road) at northern end of Andover Street, Cheltenham, 30th July
item.description:
On the edge of the A40 (Suffolk Road) at the northern end of Andover Street, as indicated on the map. The jpeg photograph won't load - have tried twice. It is a depression in the road rather than a pothole. It is slowly getting deeper. Evidently there has been a repair here at some time in the past. It has slowly been getting deeper for over a month now.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, Suffolk Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
